mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER M INNER JOIN MEMBER_ROLE MR ON M.USERNAME = MR.USERNAME INNER JOIN ROLE R ON MR.NUM = R.NUM WHERE M.USERNAME = #{userName} AND M.PASSWORD = #{password}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (USERNAME, PASSWORD, NAME, EMAIL, BIRTH, ENABLED) VALUES (#{userName}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{birth}, 1)
mapper.update: ![CDATA UPDATE MEMBER SET ENABLED = 0 WHERE USERNAME IN (SELECT USERNAME FROM MEMBER WHERE TIMESTAMPDIFF (DAY, LASTTIME, now()) >= 3)]]
